#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{   int test;
    cin >> test;
    while(test--){
    double alphabet[60];
    fill(alphabet,alphabet+60,0);
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)
    {
        alphabet[s[i]-'A']++;
    }
    int sum = 0;
    for(int i=0;i<60;i++)
    {
        sum += ceil(alphabet[i]/2);
    }
    cout << sum << endl;
}
}
